Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses temp. rerouted NB: 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, 95th; SB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, due to street blockage near 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Southbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
